org.apache.flex.compiler.workspaces

Interface IWorkspace

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IFileSpecificationGetter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Workspace

    public interface IWorkspace
extends IFileSpecificationGetter
    Implementations maintain a collection of ICompilerProject's in the workspace and state that it is shared across multiple ICompilerProject's.

    This interface extends IFileSpecificationGetter so that compilation units that do not wish to virtualize access to the file system can just use a workspace as their IFileSpecificationGetter.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Map<ICompilerProject,Set<ICompilationUnit>> NIL_COMPILATIONUNITS_TO_UPDATE
      Empty map that can be passed to endIdleState(Map) by callers who do not have a map containing ICompilationUnits whose updates to project symbol tables have been deferred.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.flex.compiler.common.IFileSpecificationGetter

        getFileSpecification, getWorkspace

    • Field Detail

      • NIL_COMPILATIONUNITS_TO_UPDATE

        static final Map<ICompilerProject,Set<ICompilationUnit>> NIL_COMPILATIONUNITS_TO_UPDATE
        Empty map that can be passed to endIdleState(Map) by callers who do not have a map containing ICompilationUnits whose updates to project symbol tables have been deferred.

    • Method Detail

      • startIdleState

        void startIdleState()
        Waits for all pending operation on all ICompilationUnit's in all ICompilerProjects in this IWorkspace to complete. The activity lock will also be acquired in this call, so once this method has been called, no new work can be submitted until after the lock has been released by calling endIdleState(Map).

        This method must never be called from an ICompilationUnit operation as that would result in dead lock.

      • endIdleState

        void endIdleState(Map<ICompilerProject,Set<ICompilationUnit>> cusToUpdate)
        Updates symbol table entries for all the ICompilationUnits in the specified map and unlocks the lock acquired by calling startIdleState().
        Parameters:
        cusToUpdate - Map from ICompilerProject to Set of ICompilationUnits in the project whose externally visible symbols need to be re-registered with the symbol table of the containing ICompilerProject.

      • startBuilding

        void startBuilding()
        Waits for the workspace to leave the idle state and prevents all threads from putting the workspace into the idle state. Calls to this method must be balanced with calls to doneBuilding().

      • doneBuilding

        void doneBuilding()
        Allows the workspace to enter the idle state once all pending operations are completed. Each call to this method should succeed exactly one call to startBuilding().

      • setProfilingDelegate

        void setProfilingDelegate(IWorkspaceProfilingDelegate profilingDelegate)
        Sets the IWorkspaceProfilingDelegate on the workspace.
        Parameters:
        profilingDelegate - IWorkspaceProfilingDelegate that will receive profiling information. Can be null, in which case no profiling information is collected.

      • getProfilingDelegate

        IWorkspaceProfilingDelegate getProfilingDelegate()
        Gets the IWorkspaceProfilingDelegate from the workspace.
        Returns:
        The IWorkspaceProfilingDelegate for this IWorkspace. Can be null.

      • addInvalidationListener

        void addInvalidationListener(IInvalidationListener invalidationListner)
        Adds a IInvalidationListener on the workspace.
        Parameters:
        invalidationListner - IInvalidationListener that will receive invalidation notifications.

      • removeInvalidationListener

        void removeInvalidationListener(IInvalidationListener invalidationListner)
        Removes a IInvalidationListener on the workspace.
        Parameters:
        invalidationListner - IInvalidationListener that will be removed.

      • getSWCManager

        ISWCManager getSWCManager()
        Get the SWC manager.
        Returns:
        ISWCManager object

      • getMXMLDataManager

        IMXMLDataManager getMXMLDataManager()
        Gets the singleton that manages DOM-like MXMLData objects for MXML files in the workspace.
        Returns:
        IMXMLDataManager object

      • fileRemoved

        void fileRemoved(IFileSpecification removedFile)
        Called by clients of the driver object model when a file remove has been detected. It is the duty of the caller to ensure no new threads are created until after this call has completed.
        Parameters:
        removedFile - An IFileSpecification that can be used to get the new contents of the removed file.

      • fileChanged

        void fileChanged(IFileSpecification changedFile)
        Called by clients of the driver object model when a file change has been detected. It is the duty of the caller to ensure no new threads are created until after this call has completed.
        Parameters:
        changedFile - An IFileSpecification that can be used to get the change filename.

      • fileAdded

        void fileAdded(IFileSpecification addedFile)
        Called by clients of the driver object model when a file add has been detected. It is the duty of the caller to ensure no new threads are created until after this call has completed.
        Parameters:
        addedFile - An IFileSpecification that can be used to get the name and contents of the added file.

      • getCompilationUnits

        Collection<ICompilationUnit> getCompilationUnits(String path,
                                               ICompilerProject project)
        Get all compilation units in the specified project related to the specified file name. This method will not return any invisible compilation units.
        Parameters:
        path - String to source filename
        project - containing project

      • getInvisibleAndVisibleCompilationUnits

        Iterable<ICompilationUnit> getInvisibleAndVisibleCompilationUnits(String path,
                                                                ICompilerProject project)
        Gets an iterator that iterates first over all invisible ICompilationUnit's for the specified file path in the specified ICompilerProject and then over all visible ICompilationUnit's for the specified file path in the specified ICompilerProject.
        Parameters:
        path - Normalized absolute file name.
        project - ICompilerProject that will contains all the ICompilationUnit in the returned Iterable.
        Returns:
        An iterator that iterates first over all invisible ICompilationUnit's for the specified file path in the specified ICompilerProject and then over all visible ICompilationUnit's for the specified file path in the specified ICompilerProject

      • getASDocDelegate

        IASDocDelegate getASDocDelegate()
        Gets the IASDocDelegate that instances of ASParser will use to record information about ASDoc comments.
        Returns:
        The IASDocDelegate that instances of ASParser will use to record information about ASDoc comments.

      • setASDocDelegate

        void setASDocDelegate(IASDocDelegate asDocDelegate)
        Sets the IASDocDelegate that instances of ASParser will use to record information about ASDoc comments.
        Parameters:
        asDocDelegate - IASDocDelegate that instances of ASParser will use to record information about ASDoc comments.
